Description:
Compelling Contemporary Quality
This fresh, fabulous three bedroom, two bathroom townhouse offers exciting , enticing light filled living and dining areas.It is enhanced by a stylish well appointed open plan kitchen including dishwasher, elec.oven and gas hotplates. Stunning polished floorboards. Gas ducted heating and split systems for year round climate comfort. Single remote garage. Own title (no body corporate). A pleasant deck overlooks the fully landscaped gardens. Currently let to a terrific tenant with a lease until Nov 2018 and paying $320 p.w. Conveniently located within walking distance to Kangaroo Flat Primary School, Crusoe College and the near completed Aquatic Centre.
Insights: 201B Aspinall Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT FOR A FIRST HOME, INVESTOR OR DOWNSIZER
This low maintenance home in the Forest Lakes area will appeal to many, the compact allotment has plenty to offer first home buyers, investors or down sizers.
With three good size bedrooms all featuring built in robes, the main has a split system air conditioner and access to the two way bathroom which boasts a shower, vanity and bath. There is another heater in the lounge which is the entry to the home. The clever floor plan has a tiled meals and kitchen area which has gas cook top, electric oven, corner pantry and good bench space there is also a separate toilet and laundry. Outside there is a single carport, paved back yard with an undercover veranda and a garden shed in an easy maintenance no mower yard. It has been updated with brand new paint and carpets and is close to transport, shopping and schools.
Insights: 29 Pattison Drive, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
In a Prime Desirable Location!
Set on a 680m2 block directly across the road from the Kangaroo Flat Station and with easy access to local shops, schools, public transport and Lansell Square shopping Centre, this home offers the location and easy-care comforts to move straight in and enjoy.
An ideal home for a multitude of buyers or savvy investors ready to enjoy an attractive rental return.
Heading inside the home you will find the sizeable master bedroom complete with walk-in robe and recently renovated deluxe bathroom which features a walk-in glass shower, modern vanity and toilet.
The well-equipped kitchen, complete with stainless steel appliances plus generous cupboard and workspace is sure to impress the chef of the family.
The open plan living and dining area is ideal for entertaining all year round.
The climate is controlled and very comfortable all year round with reverse cycle heating & cooling air conditioning and a gas wall heater.
There is access to the rear yard through double gates which features a sprawling lawn area with plenty of room for the kids to kick the footy or dogs to run wild.
There is plenty of potential here to subdivide this property STCA.
Current rental appraisal of $265 per week with a potential yield of 5.2%

Description:
LIKE NEW AND WITH A LARGE SHED!
This four bedroom family home, located in the sought after Forest Fields Estate in Kangaroo Flat, is in exceptionally good order and credit to its fastidious owners. With brand new carpets and freshly painted throughout, it presents like new and with Lansell Plaza Shopping Centre, IGA & Aldi Supermarkets, pre-school, primary & secondary schools, transport, sporting facilities, Forest Lake & bush walking or bike riding tracks all nearby, plus the CBD of Bendigo an easy 10-minute commute, this home has the location to match.
The home features four carpeted bedrooms, master bedroom comes complete with walk in robe and ensuite with an oversized shower, vanity, heated towel rail, toilet and heat lamps to take the chill off those chilly mornings. Bedrooms two and three have built in robes, whilst bedroom four has a walk-in robe and they all share the second sparkling bathroom with vanity, shower, a deep luxurious bath, heat lamps & feature tiling. A separate toilet is nearby for your convenience. The open plan kitchen/dining/living area boasts a kitchen with plenty of bench space, stainless steel electric oven, 5 burner gas cook top & dishwasher, step in pantry and an island bench with breakfast bar for casual meals. The meals area that lies adjacent is large enough for the biggest of dining tables, whilst the spacious carpeted lounge area is a great place to relax or to watch TV. A sizable second lounge is located to the front of the home. Other internal features are laundry with two door robe for storage, a walk in linen/closet for further storage, ducted gas heating & evaporative cooling throughout to keep the home very comfortable.
Moving outside finds a lovely private alfresco area with bistro blinds, perfect for entertaining your family & friends and is like a third living space. There is a great cubby house & fort with slide and sandpit and a yard big enough for the kids and pets to play . 15,000 litres of tank water storage helps reduce the water bills and is connected to the toilets & sprinkler system that looks after the low maintenance gardens with numerous fruit trees.
For the car accommodation, there is a double garage with auto door and secure internal access. A real bonus here is the side access from Whirrakee Avenue to the 6.5m x 9m shed/mancave/workshop with concrete floor, power and is ideal for storing extra vehicles such as boat, caravan, trailers, etc. All this and more on a 1003Sqm block.
The home is suitable for a multitude of buyers including first home buyers, singles, couples, families, retirees or downsizers. Vacant possession and a quick settlement are available.
Not a thing to do but move in and start enjoying your new surroundings straight away. Call today to arrange your inspection.
Directions: Turn off Lockwood Road into Forest Field Lane, then left into Queen Street. 121 is just down on the right.
Insights: 121 Queen Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Character & Elegance **New Price**
With 4 bedrooms & 3 large living areas, this charismatic, Federation style home is set on a 744m2 (approx.) allotment & features 9 foot ceilings, decorative ceiling roses, ornate cornices & quality fittings throughout. Enter into the long, wide hallway. To the right, a large formal lounge/dining area showcases the quality & style that has been crafted into the home. To the left, is the main bedroom with bay window, walk in robes & ensuite. The remaining 3 bedrooms all have built in robes & share the large, family bathroom. Follow through to the massive open plan, living area. The very functional kitchen, contains all the expected appliances & a dishwasher. Large windows provide a view over the magical gardens. Step out through the sliding door to a massive (18m x 6m) undercover, paved entertaining area offering more great views of the extensive garden & peaceful water feature winding its way along the side fence. An added bonus is the 6m x 3m colorbond workshop with concrete floor & plenty of bench space. At the back of the home, is a beautifully peaceful, low maintenance garden. Other features include brick pathways, a fishpond, a 1000 litre water tank, secure fencing & a remote double garage with roller door access to the rear. Back inside, there are 3 living areas ideal for entertaining no matter what the occasion. One features a gas log fire, providing warmth & ambience on cold winter nights. All year comfort is taken care of via ducted heating & evaporative cooling. The laundry has lots of storage & work space. This home is perfect for a family, as it is set in a wonderfully quiet Street, moments away from Kangaroo Flat High School & Primary Schools & Lansell Square Shopping Centre, with over 150 speciality shops available. This property is not to be missed & requires your immediate inspection.
Insights: 125 Queen Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Fantastic First Home/Investment – Good shedding
An excellent opportunity to enter the market with this 3 bedroom home only minutes from Kangaroo Flat shopping, Bunnings & Centro Plaza. Includes formal lounge with gas heating, kitchen/meals, 3 piece bathroom, built in robes x2 and handy rear sunroom/sleepout. Outside includes 2 separate carports, brick lock-up shed and further garden shed at the rear. Currently rented to excellent long term tenants, however vacant possession available if required. For the investor you have a sitting tenant, and for the first home-buyer an opportunity to buy at the entry level and reside from day one. The position boasts great shopping, schools and transport nearby . A stand alone home with a roomy back yard at this price level is hard to find. Be quick!

Address: 214 Mackenzie Street West Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Excellent Value in a Fantastic Location
Ideally positioned close to the new indoor swimming pool and on an allotment of approx. 825 m2, this 3 bedroom brick veneer home is located close to primary and secondary schools, parks, and public transport which is certain to suit a wide range of buyers.
Upon entering the home from the covered porch, you will immediately fall in love with all the features on offer.
The lounge room is situated to the front of the home enjoying morning sunlight streaming through the large picture windows. Year-round comfort is assured with a gas wall heater plus reverse cycle split system air conditioner.
An open plan meals area is centrally located midway between the living and kitchen areas which allows for both formal and informal dining.
The very functional kitchen has plenty of bench space and enjoys picturesque views to the rear allowing you to watch the children play in the fully enclosed yard.
All bedrooms have built in robes providing storage for the whole family.
Having friends over is a pleasure with glass sliding door access to the undercover all weather entertaining area.
Not often found, be the envy of your friends with a single car workshop with both power connected and concrete floor for the handyman plus a single car garage and also a garden shed.
Reduce your power bills with both solar electricity and solar hot water service.
A perfect home situated midway between both the CBD and Kangaroo Flat.

Address: 4 St George Park Drive Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
TIP TOP INSIDE AND OUT!!
This property is in superb order, boasts good living space and the yard is fully landscaped with the added scope of potential side access for a caravan or other vehicles.
Boasting potentially four bedrooms; there is the main with en-suite and walk in robe; bedrooms two and three with built in robes and a smaller fourth bedroom or study; all have ceiling fans.
Living space is superb here with a separate carpeted lounge and an open-plan kitchen-meals-family space located near the rear of the home with sliding door access to the al-fresco area.
The kitchen boasts an island bench, wall oven with separate grill, gas hot plates, double sink and dishwasher - there is lots of light from the large windows and sliding door.
The laundry is spacious with storage and the family bathroom is adjacent and handy to bedrooms two and three.
There is ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout, quality blinds, good paintwork and carpets.
The al-fresco space is covered, with feature stencilled concrete and a small fernery to one side; fencing is Colorbond and there's a 3m x 3m garden shed for storage; the double garage has internal access and auto door.
The yard is fully landscaped with a fantastic area for the kids to play; this space also has potential access from the side of the garage for a caravan or other vehicle. There are retaining walls where needed and good drainage.
Overall, this home is in super order and is awaiting its new owners to move straight in and enjoy!!

Description:
Modern 4 Bedroom Home in a Quiet Court Location
Located in a quiet area of Kangaroo Flat, you will find this modern 4-bedroom home, suitable for families, investors, 1st home buyers, or retirees who still need some extra space inside.
Having been recently repainted and with new floorcoverings, neutral tones compliment the interior including tiled wet areas and entrance, and carpeted bedrooms and living room.
An ensuite and walk-in robe are features of the main bedroom, while the other 3 bedrooms have built-in robes. The kitchen offers stainless steel appliances including gas hot plates and dishwasher, plus a double door pantry, and the adjacent dining area has a sliding door to the rear yard. Split system heating and cooling in the living area keeps the temperature comfortable, plus there is a 3 piece bathroom and a laundry with external access. The solar hot water system will help to keep the budget in check. Outside finds a compact block and a double garage with remote-controlled door and convenient access to the home interior. Just a short drive to schools, Lansell Square, Kangaroo Flat shopping and sporting facilities.
Vacant possession is available.
Inspections are welcome.
Insights: 11 Garnet Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Tranquil Setting
Set in a lovely tranquil semi rural setting in a sought location & street this fantastic home of approx. 4 years young is only 6 minutes drive to Lansell Square Shopping Centre.
This quality built Wright Family Home comprising of 4 bedrooms and 2 separate living areas features:
Master bedroom with full ensuite and walk-in-robe. The accompanying 3 bedrooms are generous in size and all have built in robes
Superbly appointed with Ducted heating and cooling throughout.
The Chef’s Kitchen features Stainless Steel appliances that includes a dishwasher and walk through pantry.
There’s a large under cover tiled patio area just perfect for entertaining guests
Enjoying a semi-recessed setback from the street the home has a split-level block of land. At the rear there looks like enough room to add shedding etc.,
The home has room for 2 cars in the LUG with direct security access to the home and more in the drive way and plenty off street
Vacant possession ready to move in now
Inspections are by appointment so please call William on 0417 321 688

Description:
Move Right In and Relax!
Presented immaculately, with a lovely modern kitchen, this three bedroom home has rooms of generous proportions, lovely high ceilings with decorative cornices, practical picture rails, gas ducted heating, ducted evaporative cooling and solar assist HWS. External canvas blinds protect the kitchen, dining, lounge and main bedroom windows.
The kitchen is a delight with a dishwasher, gas oven and hot-plates, great storage - numerous drawers, utility hutch and two double door pantries, and a breakfast bar separating the large dining area. The bathroom is in three parts with separate toilet, separate shower room and separate bathroom with bath and large modern vanity.
Excellent cabinetry is to be had in the updated laundry, with handy bench and overhead storage cupboards.
There is storage galore in the L shaped passageway and relaxation will be pleasant in the full width, covered entertainment area along the rear of the house, complete with a small area of lawn and an ornamental fountain.
Side access via double gates enables parking in the double garage which has additional lighting for the workshop area, plus additional space suitable for an extra vehicle, caravan or trailer, etc. The colorbond fencing and a gate either side of the house makes for a secure and safe area for children and pets.
The position is excellent, with ample shopping, schools, medical clinics and the soon to be completed Kangaroo Flat Aquatic Centre all either within walking distance, or a very short drive away.
Property Code: 869

Description:
IMMACULATE CONTEMPORARY MASTERPIECE
Casual living and contemporary design combine in this multi-level home to create a stylish yet functional domain.
Tucked away in a quiet new home area, it ticks all the boxes with three bedrooms plus study/4th, two designer bathrooms and an open living area layout perfect for entertaining and watching the kids play outside.
The upper level houses the study/4th bedroom and the sumptuous main bedroom with its walk-in robe, ensuite and slate-tiled balcony where you can slide back the doors for a cooling breeze in summer and wake up to views over the surrounding neighbourhood.
The hub of the home is the extensive open living, dining and kitchen area where windows and a sliding door to the backyard fill every corner of the area with natural light.
The kitchen shines with glass splash backs behind the 900mm oven and gas cooktop with glossy white cabinetry including pantry, appliance cupboard, wine rack and large waterfall island bench incorporating the sink, dishwasher and plenty of pot drawers.
Two more bedrooms and the main bathroom with relaxing spa bath, shower and vanity and separate toilet share this level while the laundry with great storage and external access is found beside a
personal access door to the double remote garage.
Outside, the perfectly private backyard includes a covered alfresco area and easy-care landscaping featuring natural rock retaining walls planted with hardy plants, shade sails, a grassed area for kids or pets, garden shed and under-house storage.
Immaculately presented, inside and out there is nothing left to do here but unpack the moving boxes, sit back and relax.
Ideally located a short walk to Kangaroo Flat Primary School, Crusoe College and public transport

Description:
Attractive home that offers so much!
Perfectly set on a low maintenance allotment, and established amongst quality homes within a great setting, is this 3 bedroom, open plan, modern-designed BV home.

Ducted heating and split-system air-con, ceiling fans and 9ft ceilings.
Kitchen with island bench, dishwasher and internal access through from the double garage.
Minimal fuss outside with tidy yards and gardens. Minutes to Kangaroo Flat amenities and shops, on the Melbourne side of the Calder, and all placed in a perfect pocket of Kangaroo Flat.

Description:
Period Charm with Modern Appeal
Impressive in both its superb position and styling, this home has been stunningly redesigned and is sure to appeal to a multitude of buyers. This beautiful property offers a private environment, that blends its original charm with a smart modern design. Along with the spacious kitchen dining areas, the home also offers a large lounge room for all the family to enjoy. A generous & versatile floorplan filled with high quality finishes. As you enter the home you are greeted with the beautiful polished hardwood floors that feature right throughout. Three generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes, split system air conditioning in the master with ceiling fans in bedrooms two & three. A light & bright modern bathroom with semi frameless shower screen and full-sized bath complete with timber top vanity continue the modern design feel.The kitchen is any family chef’s dream with ample cupboard and bench space to cook up a storm. The stainless steel appliances include the wall oven, five burner gas cooktop, dishwasher and side by side fridge with plumbed water ready to go. Keeping the temperature comfortable all year round is an additional reverse cycle heating & cooling split system located in the kitchen dining area.
Some additional features include:
- A bright casual kitchen/informal meals area that flows seamlessly to the beautifully landscaped rear yard and gardens
- Immense street appeal, welcoming garden entrance, highly valuable off-street parking
- Deluxe gourmet gas kitchen with oversized benches and high-end stainless steel appliances
- Moments to local cafes, bus, train and parks, easy access to CBD

Description:
Stylish Living or Perfect Investment
From the moment you step inside this beautifully presented residence, you'll realise the modern design and exceptional value is impossible to ignore.
- Free flowing floor plan showcases an open-plan design incorporating a well equipped kitchen overlooking the meals area, and living space.
- 4 bedrooms with main including his and her robes plus ensuite.
All other bedrooms are equipped with built in robes.
- Undercover, paved Alfresco area overlooks the spacious yard, with the allotment measuring 672m2.
Includes vehicle access to rear via side secure gates, perfect for storing trailers, caravan or boats.
- Further attributes include double garage, multiple heating and cooling options, plus tastefully selected colour schemes throughout.
- Conveniently positioned, within close proximity to shopping centres, supermarkets, educational and recreational facilities, plus public transport.
First home buyers will reap the rewards of not paying stamp duty, however there will no doubt be an excellent level of interest from other owner occupiers, as well as astute investors.
An inspection will leave you thoroughly impressed.

Description:
Modern Low Maintenance Living. Enjoy from day One
Near new this modern low maintenance family home is ideal for the busy family, or excellent opportunity for the investor. Features include 3 bedrooms, walk in robe and ensuite to main, built in robes to the other bedrooms, formal lounge at the front of the home and large open plan living towards the rear. The spacious living area includes modern kitchen with dishwasher, pantry and breakfast bar, adjoining meals and family areas plus ducted heating and cooling throughout. Other features Include a 3 piece family bathroom, laundry and extra storage off the passage. From inside to out the home includes a double garage with internal access to the home, and from the living area there is access to the paved entertaining area all situated on a low maintenance landscaped allotment. Positioned in Kangaroo Flat and only a short walk to Centro Plaza, Bunnings, excellent shopping, schools and transport, plus the added bonus of being on the Melbourne side of town. Ideal for the modern family with functional open plan spaces, yet easy low maintenance living; and for the investor a modern established home ready to go.
